site.title: BoardClaude - Multi-Perspective Project Evaluation
site.description: Assemble a board of AI agents that evaluate your project from multiple expert perspectives.

hero.heading: BoardClaude
hero.tagline: We Didn’t Get a Spot. So We Built the Judges.
hero.description: Six AI agents, each inspired by a real hackathon judge, evaluate your project from different expert perspectives. Whether you’re competing or just building—get the feedback that matters.
hero.trySubtext: or install the CLI for full panel audits

story.heading: The Story
story.p1: Anthropic’s “Built with Opus 4.6” hackathon invited developers to push the boundaries of what’s possible with Claude. 500 spots. We didn’t get one.
story.p2: So we did the next best thing: we studied the judges. Six industry experts, each with a distinct perspective on what makes software great—architecture, product thinking, AI innovation, developer experience, documentation, and community impact. We built AI representations of each one.
story.p3: The result is BoardClaude: a configurable panel of AI agents that evaluate your project the way a real judging panel would. Paste a GitHub URL to try a quick review, or install the CLI for the full six-judge experience with scored dimensions, radar charts, and prioritized action items.

install.heading: Get Started
install.description: Install the BoardClaude plugin for Claude Code with the install script.
install.hint: Then run {command} in any project to start your first evaluation.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Try it online with one agent, or install the CLI and configure a full panel of judges.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Six AI agents evaluate in parallel. Each scores independently with extended thinking.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Composite scores, radar charts, strengths, weaknesses, and prioritized fixes.

panel.heading: The Panel
panel.description: Six AI agents, each inspired by the public work and expertise of a real hackathon judge.
panel.disclaimer: AI representations inspired by the public work and expertise of the real judges. Not affiliated with or endorsed by them.

loop.heading: The Self-Improvement Loop
loop.description: BoardClaude doesn’t just evaluate—it drives iterative improvement. Audit your project, fix the top issues, and re-audit to measure progress.
loop.progressionLabel: Real score progression from this project:
loop.cta: Each cycle finds new issues, fixes them, and proves the improvement with data.

features.heading: Features
features.multiAgentDesc: 6 specialized agents run in parallel, each with calibrated criteria and weights.
features.closedLoopDesc: Audit → Fix → Re-audit until scores improve. Tracked action items across iterations.
features.realValidationDesc: TypeScript errors, test results, lint output, and performance metrics fed directly to agents.
features.configPanelsDesc: YAML configs for any evaluation scenario — code review, startup pitch, hackathon judging.
features.tryOnlineDesc: Paste a GitHub URL for a full 6-agent panel review. No install needed.
features.scoreProgressionDesc: Track improvement across iterations with delta scoring and regression detection.

results.title: Audit Results - BoardClaude
results.description: Browse all BoardClaude audit results and score progressions.
results.heading: Audit Results
results.emptyState: No audits yet. Run your first audit with {command}

auditDetail.title: Audit Detail - BoardClaude
auditDetail.description: Detailed audit report with per-agent scores and analysis.
auditDetail.comingSoonDescription: This page will display per-agent scores, radar chart, divergent opinions, action items, and the full synthesis report.

errors.globalDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.resultsDescription: Could not read audit data. Run an audit first or check that audit files are valid.
errors.auditDetailDescription: Could not read this audit report. The file may be missing or contain invalid data.
errors.notFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist.
errors.auditNotFoundDescription: The requested audit does not exist or could not be loaded.
errors.timelineDescription: Could not read timeline data. Run an audit first to generate timeline events.

timeline.title: Audit Timeline - BoardClaude
timeline.description: Track the self-improvement journey across audit iterations.
timeline.heading: Audit Timeline
timeline.subheading: Self-improvement journey from first audit to current score.
timeline.noEvents: No timeline events yet. Run your first audit with /bc:audit.
timeline.agentProgressionDesc: Individual agent scores across audit iterations.

boards.title: Panel Templates - BoardClaude
boards.description: Browse and customize evaluation panel templates for multi-agent evaluation.
boards.heading: Panel Templates
boards.subheading: Pre-built evaluation panels for common use cases. Customize any template or build your own.

builder.title: Board Builder - BoardClaude
builder.description: Create a custom evaluation panel with configurable agents and criteria.
builder.heading: Board Builder

tryIt.heading: Try It Now
tryIt.description: Paste a public GitHub repo URL for a full 6-agent panel review. No install required.
tryIt.orInstall: or install the CLI for full panel audits
tryIt.byokHint: Your key is sent over HTTPS for this request only. Never stored.
tryIt.byokCostEstimate: Estimated cost: ~$0.15–0.40 per review (Opus + Sonnet models)
tryIt.rateLimitByok: 30 reviews per hour with your key
tryIt.byokModeDescription: Opus for Boris/Cat/Thariq/Lydia, Sonnet for Ado/Jason
tryIt.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL.
tryIt.rateLimited: Rate limit reached. Try again later or use your own API key.
tryIt.repoNotFound: Repository not found. Make sure it exists and is public.
tryIt.invalidApiKey: Invalid API key. Keys should start with sk-ant-.
